pages.text: Mine these vines to obtain $(l:gaim/items/orange_lockseed)Lockseeds$(/l)$(br2)Drops:$(li)$(l:gaim/items/himawari_lockseed)Himawari Lockseed$(/l) (18.8%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/matsubokkuri_lockseed)Matsubokkuri Lockseed$(/l) (12.5%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/kurumi_lockseed)Kurumi Lockseed$(/l) (12.5%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/donguri_lockseed)Donguri Lockseed$(/l) (12.5%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/melon_lockseed)Melon Lockseed$(/l) (6.3%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/pine_lockseed)Pine Lockseed$(/l) (6.3%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/ichigo_lockseed)Ichigo Lockseed$(/l) (4.4%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/orange_lockseed)Orange Lockseed$(/l) (6.3%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/banana_lockseed)Banana Lockseed$(/l) (6.3%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/budou_lockseed)Budou Lockseed$(/l) (6.3%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/suika_lockseed)Suika Lockseed$(/l) (0.6%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/mango_lockseed)Mango Lockseed$(/l) (1.9%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/durian_lockseed)Durian Lockseed$(/l) (3.8%)$(li)$(l:gaim/items/kiwi_lockseed)Kiwi Lockseed$(/l) (1.9%)
